@PIBHomeAffairs @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @CimGOI @MIB_India @COVIDNewsByMIB @PIB_India @DDNewslive @airnewsalerts Was these step’s so necessary, when our fight against #coronavirus is midway, could not we have waited till #3rdmay & strategic manner accessed the situation.#IndiaFightsCoronavirus #IndiaFightsCOVID19 
With sudden announcements like these, there is always chance of panic.
